title: Report a Lost or Stolen EBT Card
description: A SNAP recipient needs to report their Electronic Benefit Transfer (EBT) card as lost and request a replacement.

tasks.description: Identify and authenticate the benefits recipient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the citizen's identity.

tasks.description: Immediately deactivate the lost EBT card to prevent fraudulent use.
Order a replacement card to be mailed to the citizen's address on file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the request for a new card.
